description.narrative: Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) in School Officer Robert Taban Lominsuk post 101587, in charge of Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) in school and Hygiene promotion-TA NO2, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Target population in conflict-affected, underserved, and epidemic-prone communities in South Sudan have improved access to equitable and sustainable Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services by 2018.
